Sqls.Sql: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM dbo.HA_Method a left join dbo.HA_Interface b on a.intf_code = b.intf_code left join dbo.HA_Project c on b.proj_code = c.proj_code;
SELECT a.[intf_code] '接口代码' ,a.[intf_name] '接口名称' ,b.[proj_name] '项目名称' FROM [dbo].[HA_Interface] a left join [dbo].[HA_Project] b on a.proj_code=b.proj_code
SELECT a.[intf_code] '接口代码' ,a.[intf_name] '接口名称' ,b.[proj_name] '项目名称' FROM [dbo].[HA_Interface] a left join [dbo].[HA_Project] b on a.proj_code=b.proj_code where a.proj_code='#proj_code#'
SELECT [proj_code] '项目代码',[proj_name] as '项目名称' FROM [dbo].[HA_Project]

SELECT a.para_name, a.para_default, a.para_datatype FROM [dbo].[HA_Parameter] a left join [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] b on a.para_code in (select col from dbo.split((select i.ag_paras from [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] i where i.ag_code='#ag_code#')+',' ,',')) where b.ag_code='#ag_code#'
